oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The sorcerer !nuin|kuiten. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-15. 5079-5101, 5104-5109). A song that Dia!kwain's father Xaa-ttin used to sing: when he used to sleep he would hear a person calling him (the sorcerer !nuin-|kui-ten).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What Xaa-ttin used to sing (the broken string)
